response.overview: Hurray, it's Christmas time and all the inhabitants of Sunnyville are ready to celebrate with a song and a dance! But wait! Brooklyn the lion, Peanut the giraffe and Beezbee the tiny bee have a question: why can't we celebrate Christmas all year long? Imagine, celebrating Christmas in summer! Wouldn't it be nice to take a dip in the pool and open Christmas presents all at the same time? Sounds like a brilliant idea, doesn't it! Will Fritz the ice-cream monkey have the answer? Will Sunny know why playing at the beach couldn't go hand in hand with singing yuletide songs? Join Brooklyn, Peanut and Beezbee and find out in Christmas Dance 3!
response.title: Christmas Dance 3
